1:
Hear my prayer, Yahweh; listen to my pleas.\q Because of your faithfulness and righteousness, answer me!
\q
2:
Do not enter into judgment with your servant,\q for in your sight no one is righteous.


\q
4:
My spirit is overwhelmed within me;\q my heart despairs.


\q
6:
I spread my hands out to you in prayer;\q my soul thirsts for you in a parched land.
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
7:
Answer me quickly, Yahweh, because my spirit faints.\q Do not hide your face from me,
\q or I will become like those who go down into the pit.
\q
8:
Let me hear your covenant faithfulness in the morning,\q for I trust in you.
\q Show me the way where I should walk,
\q for I lift up my soul to you.


\q
9:
Rescue me from my enemies, Yahweh;\q I flee to you to hide.
\q
10:
Teach me to do your will,\q for you are my God.
\q May your good Spirit
\q lead me in the land of uprightness.


\q
11:
Yahweh, for your name's sake, keep me alive;\q in your righteousness bring my soul out of trouble.
\q
12:
In your covenant faithfulness cut off my enemies\q and destroy all the enemies of my life,
\q for I am your servant.
